divs: Sighting DetailsSailing on the Chesapeake. Saw the pipelike large object with no wings going left to right ...no wings.....took a picture of it while husband was sailing. No sound...about 1 mile away, then it took off through the clouds. This is the second time we had an encounter. The first time was in the evening in Tiffin, Ohio. I have a picture, but you will show my husband's face, so I will not send the photo I have. Would be happy to send it to you with a different venue without public viewing.
Summary: Sailing on the Chesapeake. I said "My God, look at that!" large pipelike object moving behind me as I was sailing, started at first going horizontally and then ascened through the clouds and upward.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rock Hall, MD
This sighting has never been favorited.
